text: What structure do you need to build with the trusses?

label: Description of Structure (e.g., stage frame, lighting grid)
name: truss_structureDesc

text: What are the exact measurements for the structure?

label: Do you have a design or diagram for the structure?
name: truss_diagram

text: What is the purpose of the truss structure? (lighting, scenery support...)

label: What type of truss material do you prefer?
name: truss_material

label: What load capacity is required for the truss structure? (lbs)
name: truss_loadCapacity

label: Any specific weight requirements for items hung from the truss?
name: truss_weightSpecs

label: Will you need rigging points for the trusses?
name: truss_rigging

label: What type of installation service do you require?
name: truss_installService

label: What is the expected setup time (hours)?
name: truss_setupTime

label: Any special requests or considerations for the truss setup?
name: truss_specialRequests

label: Who will be the on-site contact for the truss setup? (Name & Phone)
name: truss_onSiteContact

label: Do you require any safety measures (safety cables, padding)?
name: truss_safety
